title: The Sugar Daddy: Episode 226
description:
Peter Morgan was a multi-millionaire used to getting everything he wanted. And when he fell for a much younger woman, he couldn't understand why she saw their relationship as sex for money and didn't feel the same about him. But then in 2015, events took a shocking turn.....

Writing and Research
  • Haze at 'Murder She Wrote' podcast
UK True Crime Live - free tickets
